ip.title: KNX IP settings
ip.body: Enter the IP address from the KNX IP gateway to use. Press the search IP interface button to search
ip.interfaceaddress: Enter the IP interface IPv4 address
ip.scanbutton: Scan the network for IP interfaces

configmode.title: Choose KNX configuration method
configmode.body: Choose the configuration method wich will be used to add the KNX device to Homey.

learnmode.title: Learnmode
learnmode.explanation: Pair a KNX button to a virtual button in Homey.

newxml.title: New ETS configuration
newxml.explanation: Upload a ETS configuration file (*.knxproj) to extract and store the KNX groupaddresses.

ets.title: Upload an ETS project
ets.body: Upload a ETS configuration file (*.knxproj) to extract the KNX groupaddresses.

groupaddresses.body: Select which groupaddresses to use with the new device
